Name: Geisha Martini
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of float wafer thin cucumber slice.
Review: A Vodka Martini given a Japanese influence with sake and Japanese whisky. Omit the sugar syrup if you like your Martinis bone dry.
History: Created in November 2016 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Geisha Martini contains 172 calories
